page.title: 19Folk Customs
page.content: A popular event in the area is the Desborough carnival which first started in 1920. The carnival starts off in{Dunkirk Avenue}on a Saturday in June every year.There are normally about sixty floats and about a hundred walking entrys, with a trophy for the winning entry.There is a fayre at the recreation ground after. Brookjumping is held yearly at {Desbororough}Brook, which is dammed up at one end to let the water get deeper. People use a rope to try and swing over to the other side. If you land in the water you are out. It has been going on for 15 years and it is a lot of fun. There is a story to do with{Triangular Lodge,}near Rushton. It started when two men persuaded a fiddler to go down a tunnel nearby.
